products.description: TIMELESS DESIGN: Meet the PUMA Club II Era, a fresh twist on the terrace classic, with new design elements and its football heritage intact. COMFORT AND SUPPORT: The SoftFoam+ sockliner provides superior cushioning and optimal comfort for every step of your day. DISTINCTIVE DETAILING: These shoes take on street style with smooth suede and leather upper and a heavy texture on the tooling. BRANDING: PUMA logo on tongue and on the heel. FOREVER BETTER: PUMA is always pushing to be better than we were yesterday. FOREVER BETTER is our commitment to reduce our environmental impact and work together towards a sustainable future. PUMA’s leather products support responsible manufacturing via the Leather Working Group.

products.name: Staud Valerie Shoulder Bag in Red
products.brandedName: STAUD Valerie Shoulder Bag in Red
products.description: Staud Valerie Shoulder Bag in Red Suede exterior with textile lining. Made in Vietnam. Top zipper closure. One main compartment. Interior slip pocket. Integrated leather handle. Detachable and adjustable leather shoulder strap. Measures approx 10 W x 6 H x 3.25 D Shoulder strap with a 24 drop Top handle with a 7.25 drop. STAD-WY83. H24P6006SD. About the designer: After an impressive stint as a fashion stylist and director, Sarah Staudinger took a stab at venturing solo with her namesake brand STUAD. Co-founded with partner, George Augusto in 2015, this LA-cool girl collection of dresses, handbags and footwear insists upon the notion that fashion shouldn’t just empower women — it should be accessible, too.At heart of STAUD is design, think: scrupulous attention to detail, a natural opposition tothe typical, and a feminine aura that’s equal parts seductive and self-governing with the principle belief that fashion is a never-ending pursuit of style.

products.name: Juno Leather Sandal
products.brandedName: Gianvito Rossi Juno Leather Sandal
products.description: Introducing the Gianvito Rossi Juno Leather Sandal, a chic and timeless addition to your summer wardrobe. Made in Italy with impeccable craftsmanship, these sandals feature knotted straps in black leather for a sophisticated look. The lightly padded leather insole ensures all-day comfort, while the smooth leather sole adds a touch of luxury to every step. Gianvito Rossi is known for effortlessly blending Italian chic with wearability, making these sandals a must-have for any fashion-forward woman. Please note that size selections are European, so be sure to reference the size chart for US conversions. Rest assured that our products are 100% genuine, as we stand by the authenticity of every item sold on our site. Elevate your style with the Gianvito Rossi Juno Leather Sandal.

Elliatt has taken the globe by storm, celebrating every occasion, big and small, and the incredible vibe created by 'coming together'. products.name: Patricia Nash Marion Tote
products.brandedName: Patricia Nash Marion Tote
products.description: With errand-ready practicality, this structured bag is the latest in Patricia Nash's iteration of totes as artistry. In supple Vintage Parisian Floral Tooled Leather with a scalloped, heart-shaped opening, it is fitted with a large internal zipped pocket to keep your essentials safe and easy to find. The exterior has an ingeniously designed rear zip pocket on the diagonal. Twisted rope twin handles and an adjustable/detachable shoulder strap allow you to switch up the ways to carry it.
